thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: James Todd
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by James Todd

author: James Todd
title: James Todd
text:
I ordered from Screen Country after a recommendation to use them. The prices were fair, and the service excellent. I was impressed by the solid packaging for the screen, and it arrived undamaged. Ordering was easy, and I appreciated the spot on the order form for the name of the laptop, to assure compatibility.
I will be ordering from Screen Country again.
